"Sea battle" - a game for two participants, in which players take turns to call the coordinates on an unknown map of the opponent. If the opponent has a ship at these coordinates (the coordinates are occupied), then the ship or part of it is "drowned", and the hit gets the right to make another move. The player\'s goal is to be the first to sink all the enemy\'s ships.

Classic playing field"

Important! the ship will end up at the selected point with its upper left point. After placing all the ships, press the "next" button. You can also use automatic placement using the "auto" button.

In the drawing, the sequence of touches is indicated by red dots"
